item.title: Apple A9 Processor varients
item.description: Apple has chosen two A9 chip manufactures Samsung and TWSC. These chips are different die sizes and have dissimilar performance characteristics.

item.title: Train derailed and 4 injured
item.description: In Vermont four persons were injured after a train derailment

item.title: New iPhone released
item.description: The iPhone 6s and iPhone 6S Plus have recently been released
